synopsis.text: Much to her delight, Sakura Kinomoto, now a first-year student at Tomoeda Middle School, is reunited with her beloved Shaoran Li, who has returned to Tomoeda for good. Just as life seems to be going perfectly, Sakura experiences a puzzling dream featuring a mysterious cloaked figure, and her Sakura Cards inexplicably turn transparent. With her cards powerless, Sakura embarks on a new mission to uncover the truth behind the enigmatic figure and the appearance of new transparent cards. Armed with a magical key, Sakura and her friends must capture these strange cards, marking the beginning of an exciting new chapter in the Cardcaptor Sakura saga.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
